name: TPC Sawgrass
address: 110 Championship Way, Ponte Vedra Beach, FL 32082
tagline: Where legends play, where love celebrates
description: TPC Sawgrass is one of the most iconic venues in North Florida. Home of THE PLAYERS Championship, this world-renowned golf club offers a wedding experience unlike any other. The clubhouse and grounds provide a sophisticated backdrop for couples who want their celebration to feel as legendary as the course itself.
